page.shortlink: api ui browse for folder function
page.prototype: Selected_Folder as C = UI_BROWSE_FOR_FOLDER([C DisplayText [, L ShowEditBox]])

argument.name: Selected_Folder
argument.description: The folder selected by the operator.

argument.name: DisplayText
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". The prompt that appears below the window title. Character

sections.section: The UI_BROWSE_FOR_FOLDER() function allows you to browse for a directory using the standard Windows browse utility.

section.title: Example
section.example: ? ui_browse_for_folder("Select a Folder and Click OK") = "C:\Adobe"
